ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Providing a customizable CSS grid overlay for web developers to aid in grid-based layout design
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Customizable columns, rows, grid gaps, and outside margin â€¢ Attachment to window or HTML element via CSS selectors â€¢ Support for custom grid-template-columns/rows for uneven grids â€¢ Persistence during hot reload â€¢ Adjustable line color and stroke width
ðŸ“– Summary: Gridt is a customizable CSS grid overlay that allows developers to adjust various grid properties, attach it to different elements, and handle uneven grids. It persists through hot reloads and offers options for visual customization. The tool is designed to simplify the process of designing and debugging grid-based layouts.
